pages.body:
## Table of Contents

* [Docs & References](#doces-references)
* [Tutorials & Learning Resources](#tutorials-learning-resources)
* [Site Templates](#site-templates)
* [Dev Tools](#dev-tools)
* [Dev Services](#dev-services)
* [Devs & Opensource Projects](#devs-opensource-projects)
  * [Coffeescript](#coffeescript)
  * [Vue.js](#vue-js)
  * [Other js frontend & unconfirmed](#other-js-frontend-unconfirmed)
  * [Backend - python, etc.](#backend-python-etc-)

--- ---

## Docs & References

1.  [ZeroNet Documentation](https://zeronet.io/docs/)

2.  [ZeroNet Documentation GitHub repository](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/Documentation/)

3.  [ZeroNet Documentation Unofficial ZeroNet Clone](/1Docsfk5uLvuXkL4U13eYDxCm2gzi1fNQq/) (outdated)

## Tutorials & Learning Resources

1.  [New ZeroChat tutorial](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:99:ZeroChat+tutorial+new) #official #javascript

2.  [Old ZeroChat tutorial old](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:46:ZeroNet+site+development+tutorial+2) (coffeescript)

3.  [Zeronet Tutorials](/1Jtjb5CU9aod4jtz8hF5NPPqFKofRSsb4x/) (multisource)

4.  [The Truth about ZeroNet](https://github.com/krixano/ZeroNet-Dev-Center/issues/28)

     Tutorials and zite examples written by imachug (gitcenter@zeroid.bit), including 13 chapters from understanding basic ZeroNet components to advanced topics like merger sites and merged content. **Great starting point for new developers.**

5.  [ZeroNet Dev Center](/14pM9huTYzJdyQyHRj6v2kfhMe8DrxwpGt/?/tutorials)

6. [Udemy Courses](/udemy.acabin.bit)

     This zite provides magnet URI's for a bunch of udemy courses. Every torrent includes: all videos, all subtitles and all course files.

7. [Github Awesome Meta List](https://github.com/sindresorhus/awesome)

   Just awesome ;)

## Site Templates

1. [[ZeroTemplate]]

     ZeroTemplate is a template for creating and developing ZeroNet sites. It provides an easy way to develop advanced ZeroNet sites with NPM dependencies and automatic building and releasing.

2.  [Kopi](/1KtzUsnmwc1Wr7KWWEGnWzmBSQoyH917Pz) 

    Kopi is a ZeroNet boilerplate with all the necessary elements to start a new project without the need to configure and develop the same features again and again.

3. [ZeroNetTemplate](https://github.com/anoadragon453/ZeroNetTemplate)

   Site template for making ZeroNet sites with modern web technologies.

4. [Zeronet/React example site](https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-react)

    Get started creating a ZeroNet site using React. Need to be updated.

## Dev Tools

1. [[ZeroFrameJS|ZeroFrame WebSocket API for JavaScript]]

    This is JavaScript WebSocket client for ZeroFrame API. It supports (almost) same features as default ZeroFrame that is included in ZeroNet sites, but it is using WebSocket client so it can be used in local programs, such as Node.js and Electron. It can't be used in browsers because of CORS restrictions.

1. [[ZeroFramePy|ZeroFrame WebSocket API for Python]]

    This is Python WebSocket client for ZeroFrame API. It supports (almost) same features as default ZeroFrame that is included in ZeroNet sites, but it is using WebSocket client so it can be used in local programs.

2.  [ZeroDevLib](https://github.com/imachug/ZeroDevLib)

    Libraries for ZeroNet site development.

3. [Zeroframe on NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/zeroframe)

4.  [ZeroFrame Router](/1K2myjtjoEVpRC2JMieRL73ES4V4iLP2Ev/?/) #vue.js

    A very basic router that works with the ZeroFrame API.

5. [Mavo](/1F6Rt2QNMA6uJTSTZkDNBfXTd3unrtgcdJ/) #official #experimental

     ZeroNet storage plugin for Mavo that allows any web application created for this platform to run in a P2P and decentralized way without any modification. [[ref]](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:113:ZeroNet+backed+for+Mavo)

6.  [zeronet-websocket](/1JKPBG3dLp9FARyarPoR3Mv3p5d9Fy9Em1)

    Nodejs websocket wrapper for ZeroFrame API

7.  [ZeroNet-cmd-lib](https://github.com/imachug/ZeroNet-cmd-lib)

    Python websocket wrapper for ZeroFrame API, command-line tools for ZeroNet and some ZeroNet sites.

## Dev Services

1. [Git Center](/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/)

    Git Center is a decentralized hosting platform for Git repositories. Provides several collaboration features such as bug tracking for every project, and private and public repositories.

2. [0git](/0git.bit/)

   Git repositories hosted on ZeroNet.

3. [Git over ZeroNet](/1xxooZ7s8iDz3u56i5mNQ1XGmwF8Zvnw9/)

4. [Static git repository page generator](/stagit.0git.bit/)

5.  [CodeR](/1CodEr7T9xNXSPcwbsvf5fHTqsixDMwDzL/)

    JSFiddle and CodePen alternative.

6. [NullPaste](/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/) 

    PasteBin alternative.

7.  [ZeroDB](/ZeroDB.bit/)

    Visual editor to create Dbschema files.

## Devs & Opensource Projects

### Coffeescript

1.   [HelloZeroNet](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/) (Nofish)

    * Repos of all ZeroNet official zites [[Gitlab repo]](https://gitlab.com/HelloZeroNet/)
    * ZeroNet (src/Ui/media) [[Git Center repo]](/1P4w4Rvh4vS9r6G5xTiSh8qEW87EKZtnJB/)

1.  affeali
    *    [ZeroWikiImproved](/1BeUcctgazL9DkHgPD8zFpCNggqjEEfjRu)

         Experimental improved ZeroWiki with history-diff feature.

1.  binchan2
    *    [ZeroBlog Plus](/1M5dciFFSWt4wKs9Nnxa34BgGnt7os7h3v)

         Enhanced ZeroBlog including TOC, tag, mobile, etc.
    *    [ZeroMe Mobile](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroMe/pull/100/)

         Hub feed timeline, language character filter and chronological timeline
    *    [Binchan's 0-Share](/1DjFq5aHgM7vRZqP3mB4dWH8RAh6us8nHb)

         Yet another enhanced ZeroUp clone

9.  Emeraude
    *   [ZeroMusic](https://github.com/Emeraude/ZeroMusic)

8.  [ZeroNerds](https://github.com/ZeroNerds)
    *   ZeroMeReloaded

        Enhanced ZeroMe
    *   HelloZeroProxy

        Enhanced ZeroHello for clearnet proxy

1. [ZeroNetLabs](https://github.com/ZeroNetLabs)
    * ZeroWiki
    * kopi

       Kopi is a ZeroNet boilerplate with all the necessary elements to start a new project without the need to configure and develop the same features again and again.

### Vue.js

1.  [anoadragon453](https://github.com/anoadragon453)
    *    ZeroLSTN [[Git Center repo]](/1Code5125iycoEFCMi9a4XVejFwauoyGqj/)

        ZeroNet Music Streaming Site
    *    ZeroNetTemplate

1.  imachug (gitcenter)
    * [Kiwipedia](https://github.com/imachug/Kiwipedia) [[Git Center repo]](/13c2MpR9ztCzVm7r8cTfV9h9FFEEiQ6AKD/)

         Wikipedia clone for ZeroNet with auto-import

5.  [Krixano](https://github.com/krixano/) #vue.js
    *   ZeroNet Dev Center
    *   ZeroMedium [[Git Center repo]](/1BEPbMfV8QtaZCD2cPNbabfDKnmhTAZRPx)

        Medium for ZeroNet
    *   ZeroExchage [[Git Center repo]](/17isV4gG9MmAwfcR6aroBN1nHmovrhodD4)

        StackExchange for ZeroNet. A place to ask questions and get answers.
    *   ZeroFrame Router
    *   ZeroDB [[Git Center repo]](/19t2vGe6Vmkou1rhJDjpsQoW8aCD2EWEFC/)

        Visual Editor for creating dbschema files for ZeroNet zite development. 
    *   Important Zites
    *   NewImportantZites #cors

        The New and Improved Important Zites for ZeroNet. User-added zites, fast relevance-based searching with pagination, modern design.

1.  grez911
    *   [poster](https://github.com/grez911/poster) [[Git Center repo]](/173jgCe7oqQQAG8V4dNEDyHY4mFFWJKF1Q)

        A simple blog platform for ZeroNet written from scratch using Vue.js and Bulma.

1.  Sorasumi Sayo  (空澄砂夜)
    *  [ZeroGreeter](/1Ps8mZHcKGdwtjmMLBJ9b8KU6ogEBrjEig) #vue.js

        ZeroHello alternative (source code is also available [in the zite](/presto.greeter.bit) folder)
    *  [0-Gallery](/1GdpMUiHj52rNburTfYwHP5qxBz6HPyvYy)

        User fully controls her/his own gallery by creating personal hub.
    *  [Sakana](/15Z4H5K8YxjqGWpPxMLHWwr6Ve2nR7dz8d)

        Yet another ZeroMe frontend. The UI is similar to Mastodon.

### Other js frontend & unconfirmed

1.  [AnthyG](https://github.com/AnthyG/)
    *   ThunderWave [[Git Center repo]](/1EjXEyudstY8dN3F8V5od9KoS1bkAerz9x/) #encryption

        A beautiful chat for ZeroNet with Image-Uploading, and private chat.
    *   R_MD_ZN_Blog

        A beautiful Responsive Material-Design Blog for the ZeroNet
    *   Thundote #encryption

        A beautiful note-taking app for ZeroNet. 

1. Antilibrary
    *   [Antilibrary.bit-ZeroNet-UI](https://github.com/antilibrary/Antilibrary.bit-ZeroNet-UI) [[Git Center repo]](/1ANuoPDX7RDKwEX6gFpVmu9kJWkmBkxWvc) #book-repo

       Front-End source code for the site Antilibrary.bit on ZeroNet

1.  April93 (Kaffie)
    *    [Kaffiene](https://github.com/April93/Kaffiene)

         ZeroNet search engine

1.  imachug (gitcenter)
    *    [gitcenter](https://github.com/imachug/gitcenter) [[Git Center repo ;D]](/18r929Hq8hE5Pi9Zf7ovMQVyn3WcGfxMgu/) [[Gitlab repo]](https://gitlab.com/imachug/gitcenter)

1.  jlxip
    *    [0sh](/1FZAVa7hak8pcVCvVSPz59z3f14CwSTN6H)

         ZeroShortener

1.  [Kopy Kate](https://github.com/kopy-kate)
    *    Kopy Kate

         Online streaming torrents based on WebTorrent and ZeroNet
    *    kopy-kate-big

        Video sharing platform for ZeroNet, using the Big Files feature!

1.  [mkg2001](https://github.com/mkg20001)

    *    ZeroNet-kivy #official #android #WIP
    *    [mkg20001's Git(Hub) Mirror](/1F7b27kT38nMYZQg7tvDr33qWDZQgwnQpw/)

        a small Git(Hub) mirror, where mirrors the Git projects of some people/organizations

1.  jaros1 (jro)
    *    [Money-Network](https://github.com/jaros1/Money-Network)

        Demo with complementary and alternative money. Implemented in ZeroNet and AngularJS. Focus on privacy, encryption, max data in client and min data on ZeroNet. Work in progress.

1.  mcdev
    *    [Millchan](https://gitgud.io/mcdev/Millchan) [[Git Center repo]](/15qFg3C9mYTKEAQF678xczTPprbe7b6LMf)

        P2P imageboard engine for the ZeroNet network.

1. [rllola](https://github.com/rllola)
    *    zeroTube
    *    mixtape #WIP

        new music site

1.  unkn0wn
    *   [Torrent Share](/1P6tNJ97Hi1uUXjqpX3wJBUt4UFnAZojs6)

1.  [zer0net](https://github.com/zer0net)
    *   ZeroVoat #reddit-like
    *   IFS

        Intergalactic File Server, archive.org alternative.

1. [filips123](https://github.com/filips123)
    * [ZeroTemplate](https://github.com/filips123/ZeroTemplate)
    * [Zero86](https://github.com/filips123/Zero86)

### Backend (python, etc.)

1.  [imachug](https://github.com/imachug) (gitcenter)
    *    ZeroDevLib [[Git Center repo]](/198T84VCiznCMNBAnqTNEsRGRZW77nBPNo/)

        Libraries for ZeroNet
    *    ZeroMailProxy [[Git Center repo by bornfree]](/1LnrtiTmBqYKrhorBxHsuiQLw8bKqjz5k7/)

        SMTP/POP3 protocol for ZeroMail
    *    ThunderProxy

        A local IRC server supporting ThunderBird to send/recieve messages from ThunderWave chat (ZeroNet)

    *    ZeroNet-cmd-lib

        Command-line tools for ZeroNet and some ZeroNet sites

1.  [mkg2001](https://github.com/mkg20001)
    *   ZeroNetJS #WIP

        A JS version of ZeroNet, using libp2p.

1.  [MuxZeroNet](https://github.com/MuxZeroNet)
    *   ZeroMux

       Real time video transmuxing and streaming library designed for ZeroNet (Probably deprecated in favor of official big file support).
    *   zerolib #WIP

      A Minimalist ZeroNet Protocol Library

1. [rllola](https://github.com/rllola)
    *   zeronet-torrent-plugin
    *   nanos-zeronet-app #incomplete

        POC application that allow you to create and to sign your ZeroNet website updates using the Ledger Nano S.

1.  liberit (Elspru)
    *   [Zirch](https://gitlab.com/liberit/zirch) #search-engine

1.   [EulerFinder](/1MnH9K7GnHpyhNwYRVMWAwkTmKfhQCpfvN)

    A ZeroNet search engine (with coinhive - clearnet coin-mining js)

1. [filips123](https://github.com/filips123)
    * [ZeroFrameJS](https://github.com/filips123/ZeroFrameJS)
    * [ZeroFramePy](https://github.com/filips123/ZeroFramePy)
    * [ZeroFramePHP](https://github.com/filips123/ZeroFramePHP)

ZeroFrame WebSocket API for Python
===============================

This is [[Python]] WebSocket client for [[ZeroFrame]] API. It supports (almost) same features as default ZeroFrame that is included in ZeroNet sites, but it is using WebSocket client so it can be used in local programs.

Project is available on [GitHub][link-github] and [GitCenter][link-gitcenter]. It is licensed under MIT license.

[link-github]: https://github.com/filips123/ZeroFramePy/
[link-gitcenter]: http://127.0.0.1:43110/178UMrEt8vxf5Z6LPxkrcWFPXPfD9XNNH7/

ZeroFrame WebSocket API for JavaScript
==================================

This is [[JavaScript]] WebSocket client for [[ZeroFrame]] API. It supports (almost) same features as default ZeroFrame that is included in ZeroNet sites, but it is using WebSocket client so it can be used in local programs, such as Node.js and Electron. It can't be used in browsers because of CORS restrictions.

Project is available on [GitHub][link-github] and [GitCenter][link-gitcenter]. It is licensed under MIT license.

[link-github]: https://github.com/filips123/ZeroFrameJS/
[link-gitcenter]: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HJS6quLaqNLYxHVM9nL2rfmAsRvumqC1H/

ZeroFrame WebSocket API for JavaScript
==================================

This is JavaScript WebSocket client for ZeroFrame API. It supports (almost) same features as default ZeroFrame that is included in ZeroNet sites, but it is using WebSocket client so it can be used in local programs, such as Node.js and Electron. It can't be used in browsers because of CORS restrictions.

Project is available on [GitHub][link-github] and [GitCenter][link-gitcenter]. It is licensed under MIT license.

[link-github]: https://github.com/filips123/ZeroFrameJS/
[link-gitcenter]: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HJS6quLaqNLYxHVM9nL2rfmAsRvumqC1H/

## Tutorials & Learning Resources

1.  [New ZeroChat tutorial](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:99:ZeroChat+tutorial+new) #official #javascript

2.  [Old ZeroChat tutorial old](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:46:ZeroNet+site+development+tutorial+2) (coffeescript)

4.  [The Truth about ZeroNet](https://github.com/krixano/ZeroNet-Dev-Center/issues/28)

     Tutorials and zite examples written by imachug (gitcenter@zeroid.bit), including 13 chapters from understanding basic ZeroNet components to advanced topics like merger sites and merged content. **Great starting point for new developers.**

5.  [ZeroNet Dev Center](/14pM9huTYzJdyQyHRj6v2kfhMe8DrxwpGt/?/tutorials)

6. [Udemy Courses](/udemy.acabin.bit)

     This zite provides magnet URI's for a bunch of udemy courses. Every torrent includes: all videos, all subtitles and all course files.

7. [Github Awesome Meta List](https://github.com/sindresorhus/awesome)

   Just awesome ;)

## Site Templates

1. [[ZeroTemplate]]

     ZeroTemplate is a template for creating and developing ZeroNet sites. It provides an easy way to develop advanced ZeroNet sites with NPM dependencies and automatic building and releasing.

2.  [Kopi](/1KtzUsnmwc1Wr7KWWEGnWzmBSQoyH917Pz) 

    Kopi is a ZeroNet boilerplate with all the necessary elements to start a new project without the need to configure and develop the same features again and again.

3. [ZeroNetTemplate](https://github.com/anoadragon453/ZeroNetTemplate)

   Site template for making ZeroNet sites with modern web technologies.

4. [Zeronet/React example site](https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-react)

    Get started creating a ZeroNet site using React. Need to be updated.

## Dev Tools

1. [[ZeroFrameJS|ZeroFrame WebSocket API for JavaScript]]

    This is JavaScript WebSocket client for ZeroFrame API. It supports (almost) same features as default ZeroFrame that is included in ZeroNet sites, but it is using WebSocket client so it can be used in local programs, such as Node.js and Electron. It can't be used in browsers because of CORS restrictions.

2.  [ZeroDevLib](https://github.com/imachug/ZeroDevLib)

    Libraries for ZeroNet site development.

3. [Zeroframe on NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/zeroframe)

4.  [ZeroFrame Router](/1K2myjtjoEVpRC2JMieRL73ES4V4iLP2Ev/?/) #vue.js

    A very basic router that works with the ZeroFrame API.

5. [Mavo](/1F6Rt2QNMA6uJTSTZkDNBfXTd3unrtgcdJ/) #official #experimental

     ZeroNet storage plugin for Mavo that allows any web application created for this platform to run in a P2P and decentralized way without any modification. [[ref]](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:113:ZeroNet+backed+for+Mavo)

6.  [zeronet-websocket](/1JKPBG3dLp9FARyarPoR3Mv3p5d9Fy9Em1)

    Nodejs websocket wrapper for ZeroFrame API

7.  [ZeroNet-cmd-lib](https://github.com/imachug/ZeroNet-cmd-lib)

    Python websocket wrapper for ZeroFrame API, command-line tools for ZeroNet and some ZeroNet sites.

## Dev Services

1. [Git Center](/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/)

    Git Center is a decentralized hosting platform for Git repositories. Provides several collaboration features such as bug tracking for every project, and private and public repositories.

   Git repositories hosted on ZeroNet.

    Visual editor to create Dbschema files.

ZeroNet Template
================

Template for creating and developing ZeroNet sites.

It supports NPM dependencies and it uses Gulp and Browserify for bundling scripts. It also supports SASS and automatic deployments with Travis CI.

Project is available on [GitHub][link-github] and [GitCenter][link-gitcenter]. It is licensed under MIT license.

[link-github]: https://github.com/filips123/ZeroTemplate/
[link-gitcenter]: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Aob9QXahTnn6iBriSSQ6qg8qXkHdkaX2x/
